page.title: 03FARMS - BROCKWORTH AREA
page.content: A mixed Cotswold farm recently held a conference on the relationship between {modern farming} techniques and {wildlife.} This 850 acre farm has {wheat,barley, sheep and cattle.}There is a rich variety of wildlife,however,partly due to the deliberate planting of {coverts.} Trees include Oak,Maple,Crab Apple and Cherry.Such a variety provides ideal cover for {game.} Pincott Farm is much smaller with 50 acres. It is an old Cotswold stone building with emphasis on {Dairy} farming. Another farm has 475 acres;135 of grassland;330 of arable and 150 {beef} cattle. The {work force} numbers 5. The original tithe barn was built in 1500 but was rebuilt in 1962. The farmhouse itself dates back to 1534.
